nodes.text: This Jedi chapter house was located on Aleen Minor. During the Separatist Crisis, after the mission to Antar 4, Jedi Knights led by Sarrissa Jeng brought fellow Jedi Antyard-Wo Shissan and Kaloor Cofi to Aleen after they were slain in battle.

In Star Wars: Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, the Aleen Minor chapter house was mistakenly placed on Aleen, a planet in the Mid Rim that was created to resolve continuity issues introduced by the Star Wars: The Clone Wars series.
